item.title: 📚 Publications
item.description:
• Exploring NAS for anomaly detection in superconducting cavities of particle accelerators.
    L. Boukela, J. Branlard, A. Eichler – Frontiers in Physics, 13:1553993 (May 2025).

  • A Two-Stage Machine-Learning-Aided Approach for Quench Identification at the European XFEL.
    L. Boukela, A. Eichler, J. Branlard, N. Z. Jomhari – arXiv/CoRR abs/2407-08408 (2024).

  • A Near-Autonomous and Incremental Intrusion-Detection System through Active Learning of Known and Unknown Attacks.
    L. Boukela, G. Zhang, M. Yacoub, S. Bouzefrane – arXiv/CoRR abs/2310-17430 (2023).

item.title: Posts
item.description:
🚀 Welcome to My Hugo-Powered Website

This is the front page of my site, built with Hugo and the PaperMod theme.

📌 About This Site

Welcome! Here, you’ll find:

  • 📝 Articles on tech, coding, and more
  • 🎨 Projects & Portfolios showcasing my work
  • 🔗 Resources & Links for learning and inspiration

🔥 Featured Content

💡 Check out some of my latest posts:

  • Getting Started with Hugo
  • Why I Love Static Site Generators
  • Markdown Tricks You Should Know

🌍 Connect With Me
